assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Approval to conduct this human subject research was obtained by the Research Ethics Board at the University of Alberta and the University of Calgary. All procedures followed were in accordance with the ethical standards of the responsible committee on human experimentation (institutional and national) and with the Helsinki Declaration of 1975, as revised in 2000. Implied informed consent was obtained for individuals who voluntarily completed the online survey and submitted their responses.
